1632550.name: RPG Maker MZ - Winlu Cyberpunk Tileset - Interior
1632550.description:
Dive into the world of sci-fi and create your own cyberpunk style environments! A wide range of floor and wall textures as well as interior models allow you to create your own interiors according to your preferences. The animated TVs, candles, lamps, robotic vacuum cleaner and kitchen devices will make your world look alive.

The gap between rich and poor is huge in the cyberpunk genre; a classy room or a decayed apartment? You decide!

Features

* Interior Tileset in cyberpunk style: 6 sheets
* 7 sheets of character-object tiles for: animated TV, candles, lamps, kitchen devices and more!
* A wide range of furnishings
* Compatible with RPG Maker MV / MZ


Update Jan 2026:

* PLEASE NOTE: I split the floor tiles A2 into two separate A2 tiles in order to add overlays and more textures. So you will have to make a lot of changes if you decide to use the new tiles, otherwise, you can just continue using the old ones.

-Reworked every tile and sprite.
-Added a new additional tilesheet ("D")
-Added new doors.
-Added light overlays sprites for more ambience.


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1632550.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
